meanings.sent1: The team captain acted as the synchronizers during the dance performance.
meanings.sent2: The clock was the synchronizers for all the activities in the school.
meanings.sent3: The synchronizers, a magical conductor, made sure everyone moved in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: The synchronizers of the orchestra, the conductor, waved the baton with precision.
meanings.sent5: The synchronizers, like a maestro, brought together all the different elements seamlessly.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that coordinates the timing of different parts of a system.
meanings.sent1: The traffic lights function as synchronizers to control the flow of vehicles.
meanings.sent2: The metronome is a useful synchronizers for musicians to stay in rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The synchronizers, a clever clock, made sure everyone arrived at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The synchronizers in the factory, the conveyor belt, kept all processes in order.
meanings.sent5: The synchronizers, like a conductor, ensured each step was perfectly timed.
